35993dff-0150-48ea-bead-77b8cec8ebed.description: The Sonography Principles & Instrumentation (SPI) examination tests the requisite physical principles and instrumentation knowledge, skills and abilities essential to sonography professionals and students. 41d0134b-adc7-4e70-8875-12497f316587.description: The Registered Diagnostic Medical Sonographer (RDMS) credential raises the standard of diagnostic medical ultrasound practice worldwide and promotes best practices for enhanced patient safety. By earning the RDMS credential healthcare professionals gain a critical edge in promoting public safety in ultrasound.

9c08b4bb-0439-473a-b151-d3e8982f72e8.description: The Pediatric Echocardiography (PE) examination tests the requisite pediatric echocardiography knowledge, skills and abilities essential to sonographer-level professionals. It is a specialty examination listed under the RDCS certification.
9c08b4bb-0439-473a-b151-d3e8982f72e8.name: Pediatric Echocardiography (PE) Specialty

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the education and clinical requirements of one of the published prerequisites. The prerequisites listed here may be different from those met by this badge earner.

80bcffb8-7f81-4cee-9279-1feb3f0b8d05.description: The Midwife Sonography Certificate gives midwives a critical edge in promoting public safety in women's point-of-care ultrasound. The Midwife Sonography examination assesses the requisite knowledge, skills and abilities in the areas of the female reproductive system as well as the fetus in the first, second and third trimesters of pregnancy.
80bcffb8-7f81-4cee-9279-1feb3f0b8d05.name: Midwife Sonography Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the education and clinical requirements of the published Midwife Sonography Certificate prerequisite.
Apply for, take and pass the Midwife Sonography Computer-based examination.
Complete and pass the Midwife Practical examination.
Verify the status of this certificate.
